metadata.title: CVE-2020-17368 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Firejail through 0.9.62 mishandles shell metacharacters during use of the--output or --output-stderr option, which may lead to command injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-17368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.62-4
firejail-profiles - 0.9.62-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.62-4').
